alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 11:18AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of southeastern Marin, northwestern Alameda, west central Contra Costa and northeastern San Francisco Counties through 1145 AM PDT... At 1117 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail near Tiburon, or near Richmond, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Richmond, San Pablo, El Cerrito, Hercules, Albany, Pinole, Tiburon, Tara Hills, Rollingwood, El Sobrante, Kensington, Belvedere, East Richmond Heights, Bayview-Montalvin and East Richmond Heigts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
